title: Mocca Cafe | Diverse Cafe ordering applications
description: Easily search, compare, and purchase coffee from reputable stores. Let's explore and experience the amazing flavors of coffee with us!

about-MoccaCafe.heading01: Mocca Cafe is the leading eCommerce platform in the Cafe market.
about-MoccaCafe.desc01: Launched in 2025, Mocca Cafe provides users in the region with a simple, safe and fast online shopping experience through a strong payment support and operation system.
about-MoccaCafe.desc02: We believe that online shopping experience needs to be simple, easy and bring joy to users. This mission is also the inspiration that drives us to develop every day.
about-MoccaCafe.desc03: Mocca Cafe wants to contribute to making society better through the power of technology by connecting the community of buyers and sellers.
about-MoccaCafe.desc04: Through Mocca Cafe, Internet users across the region can experience online shopping with a variety of products, connect with the community of sellers, and enjoy a seamless receiving process.
about-MoccaCafe.desc05: The motto Simple, Happy and Together defines the brand personality of Mocca Cafe through words and actions. This motto is present anywhere in our development journey.
about-MoccaCafe.desc06: We believe in simplicity and integrity, ensuring a life that is true and true to oneself.
about-MoccaCafe.desc07: We are friendly, cheerful, and full of energy, spreading joy to everyone.
about-MoccaCafe.desc08: We like to spend time together, when shopping online with friends and family - together doing the things we love.
about-MoccaCafe.desc10: Expected to be completed in the next 2 months.
about-MoccaCafe.desc11: Understanding others is the key to successful leadership. At Mocca Cafe, providing the best experience for employees, partners and users is the goal we aim for.

contact.heading: Connect with us
contact.desc: Do you have suggestions or feedback? We are very ready to hear from you! Use the form below to share your thoughts. Thank you for helping us improve!

home-banner.desc01: Here, we not only provide excellent energy coffee but also supply dreams.
home-banner.placeholder: Enter the product you want to search

home.title04: More cool features available on the app
home.desc01: From small coffee cups to complete breakfasts, we don't limit your passion. Feel free to order everything you want. We are proud to be the reliable destination for satisfying your coffee cravings.
home.desc02: Download our app to use different payment methods and enjoy the ability to order coffee anytime, anywhere.
home.desc03: The rich flavor of coffee has become familiar in the daily rhythm of each of us. Vietnamese people have a very unique way of enjoying coffee: sitting by a cup of coffee, sipping small sips while reading the newspaper, listening to music, chatting with friends. With business partners, or sitting to work, and also to reflect on life, on people.
home.desc04: Various types of roasted whole bean coffee, drip coffee, machine coffee, Espresso...
home.desc05: Enjoy the essence of the earth with a passion for coffee.
home.desc06: Proudly a product of pure roasted coffee.

toast.invalid-quantity: The quantity of product cannot exceed 10 items
toast.unauthorized: Please log in to add to cart

checkout.desc05: Use the bank transfer payment method to receive attractive offers. Only on MoccaCafe website.

checkout.desc09: Your order will be delivered to you no later than

payment.desc02: Note: The order will be automatically cancelled after

toast.noExactly: Please check the information again and enter in the correct format.

historyOrder.notify01: Please go to the cart and proceed to checkout
historyOrder.notify02: An error occurred, please try again.

topUp.desc01: Intentional top-ups below the supported level are not accepted.
topUp.desc02: Incorrect syntax, account number, or bank will incur a 20% transaction fee. For example: topping up 100k with incorrect details will result in only receiving 80k mocca cafe coins and you must contact the admin for manual adjustment.
topUp.desc03: If your account has not been credited with coins after 5-10 minutes, please contact the admin

termsOfUse.content1: Using this website implies your agreement to our terms and conditions.
termsOfUse.content2: Place orders only when you are sure the information you provide is accurate.
termsOfUse.content3: Payment is made upon receiving the order. We accept payment in cash or by credit card.
termsOfUse.content4: There is a cancellation policy, please see details on the website.
termsOfUse.content5: Your personal information is protected according to our privacy policy.
termsOfUse.content6: All intellectual property rights belong to us or are licensed.
termsOfUse.content7: We may change the terms without prior notice.
termsOfUse.content8: If you have any questions, please contact us.
termsOfUse.content9: We are committed to providing professional and prompt customer support for any issues or inquiries. Contact us through the provided channels.

help.content01: We always appreciate feedback from our customers about their experience using our services. Please share your thoughts so that we have the opportunity to improve our services and products.
help.content02-1: To send feedback immediately, please use our online feedback system.
help.content02-2: This helps us better understand your needs and desires.
help.content03: If you would like to share feedback privately, please send an email to the address
help.content04: Please describe the issue you encountered and suggest how we can improve.
help.content05: What do you find most satisfying about our services?
help.content06: What are your thoughts on the interface and user experience of our website or application?
help.content07: Do you have any suggestions for content, information, or features that you would like us to update?
help.strong05: Feedback on Interface and User Experience:

authTwinSetup.desc01: Select the method (or turn off) two-factor authentication security feature. Each change requires entering the correct TOTP authentication code.
authTwinSetup.desc02: You can use Google Authenticator app for generating authentication codes. See more about two-factor authentication & instructions for installing and using Google Authenticator.
authTwinSetup.desc04: Scan the QR Code or enter the Secret Key below into the App. Then, the App will provide you with a unique OTP code, please enter it into the "OTP Code" field below to activate the two-factor authentication feature.
authTwinSetup.otpNote: (OTP Code is a string of 6 numbers received in the App)
authTwinSetup.note02: After enabling Two-Factor Authentication / Security, each time you log in to the system, you need to add an extra authentication step by entering the correct 6-digit authentication code generated by the TOTP application.
authTwinSetup.note03: In case of device loss for code generation, only System Administrator account can disable two-factor authentication for your account.
authTwinSetup.note04: See more about two-factor authentication & instructions for installing and using Google Authenticator.

toast.invalidOtp: Please enter the OTP in the correct format.

chatMessage.desc03: Select a conversation to start messaging
chatMessage.desc06: Send a message to start the conversation
